title: Designation or change of registered agent
context: ยง425E-115** Designation or change of registered agent.** (a) A domestic limited partnership or foreign limited partnership that does not already have a registered agent shall designate its registered agent by complying with the requirements of section 425R-4. (b) A domestic or foreign limited partnership may change its registered agent by complying with the requirements of section 425R-7. &copy; If the registered agent changes its name, its address, or its type or jurisdiction of organization, the agent shall comply with the requirements of section 425R-8 or 425R-9, whichever is applicable. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1; am L 2009, c 55, ยง41]
